channel.title: Alternative to MM's little birds
channel.description:
A day/night one time use only ability for MM - Infuse: Use an ability infused from an assassin's most recent kill, If the assassin killed a noble - gain maid spy, if the assassin killed a phys - get a heal and so on. Only one use, MM has to wait on the roulette for the specific thing they want. It changes with every new kill, if the assassin kills 2 people in the night, MM gets 2 abilities to choose from if they want to spend it.
I know it would be a hell to code but yeah.

item.title: Alternative to MM's little birds
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
The only purpose of little birds was to make it so probable that the unseen can read whispers that WKM is suicide.

Personally I’m cool with removing little birds and killing allies.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternative to MM's little birds
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
It’s better to rework Noble than WKM

Read full topic

item.title: Alternative to MM's little birds
item.dc:creator: ZepSenpai
item.description:
That is true, but with this it renders nobles useless for the most part and whispers useless for the most part. Now every unseen game has an aristocrat.

Read full topic

item.description:
the reason mm’s little birds was added is so that wkm ends. it’ll probably revive if this change goes through
